A '''stone brick wall''' is a [[stone brick]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Stone brick walls can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row|Stone Brick Wall|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Stone brick walls may generate in [[ruined portal]]s in the [[Overworld]].

{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all walls|Wall#Usage}}
